What are the biggest challenges for walking ðŸš¶ in Lake Elsinore? What keeps you from walking more?

  1. Lack of sidewalks, walking trails, shops etc are not in walking distance to my distance
  2. Missing sidewalks
  3. Distance
  4. Lack of facilities

  8. Not enough sidewalks and too many homeless people
  9. Lack of sidewalk connectivity and safe, legal crossings.
  10. Lack of sidewalks.
  11. Homeless. Lightning.
  12. I would walk or bike from my house to the outlets, except there is one part where Nichols crosses a creekbed that I would have to be directly in the road. Honestly, so far north (I live near Lake St and the 15) there is really nowhere for me to walk to.

  14. Sidewalks, signage, ADA, etc

  17. To much time

  19. Lake of sidewalks

  22. Everything is so far away we need somekind of transportation
  23. No sidewalks
  24. No sidewalks connecting routes safely
  25. I live in a residential area where people do not abide by the speed limit. People are constantly driving at dangerous speeds & I do not feel comfortable with my children or I near the street or sidewalk. Crossing the street can be very dangerous at times with drivers coming around the corner at a very high-speeds.
  26. Not enough sidewalks
  27. Safety. Lack of sidewalks. Speed limits on road to children school is too fast.
  28. No sidewalks on railroad
  29. There are many hills that are tiring to walk up but also many people living on the streets that make me mildly uncomfortable and afraid to walk near. I also live up in Tuscany Hills so if I want to walk down towards stores and restaurants I must go down Summerhill and then come back up later.
  30. Speed limit on Lincoln and Grand
  31. Lack of sidewalks and feeling safe to walk in busy intersections. I'd really like to ride a bike but there is limited bike lanes, especially on Lakeshore Dr.
  32. No crosswalks
  33. Busy busy 74 with multiple fatalities, and also transients.
  34. Please put a walking path from Tuscany Hills Elementary school to the gate at Little Pony Dr. in canyon lake for school children
  35. Not enough sidewalks, especially on major roads -- even near schools! (Lakeshore near Elsinore Middle)
  36. Lack of sidewalks
  37. No, school bus for pick up. Parents working no choice but walking to school
  38. Roadways are poorly lit, cars are speeding too fast, limited amount of sidewalks, a general feeling of not feeling safe due to the number of intoxicated transients.
  39. I would say the lack of sidewalks, crosswalks and the recklessness of other drivers.
  40. No hay carreteras para caminar por donde yo camino . No hay sombra en las banquetas por donde camino como en la Lincoln. En la grand is una banqueta de tierra
  41. Poor sidewalks or lack of sidewalks. Long distances. Safety
  42. Safety, lack of sidewalks, unsafe crime and drug filled areas that do have sidewalks are unsafe to walk
  43. A lack of sidewalks and crosswalks near my neighborhood. The nearest stores and places of my interest are more than half a mile away.
  44. I would love to be able to run to the other side of the lake, but lack of sidewalks make it dangerous
  45. Sidewalk infill needed
  46. Not enough sidewalks

  34. Please put a bike path from Tuscany Hills Elementary school to the gate at Little Pony Dr. in canyon lake for school children
  35. Not enough safe routes, not enough bike lanes, speeds too high when roads are shared with automobiles, passing vehicles do not provide adequate cushion, laws not adequately enforced
  36. There are barely any bike lanes and the road surface is very rough.
  37. Don't feel comfortable. Streets small and crowded
  38. No trails or proper space to safely bike
  39. I would say the lack of sidewalks, crosswalks, bike lanes, and the recklessness of other drivers.
  40. Por el lado donde vivo (Grand Ave) la banqueta es hecha de tierra. La
  41. Poor sidewalks or lack of. Safety. Bike lanes needed.
  42. Not enough bike lanes or paved sidewalks and crosswalks
  43. Rocks, glass, debris, and thorns due to dry conditions make it easier for riders to get flat tires and other damages. Certain areas are difficult to cross and ride through due to fast traffic and having to share the road with vehicles.
  44. Some places have very tiny streets
  45. Not many bike facilities outside of downtown
  46. Not enough bike lanes
